segments.text: I notice the light coming in from the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's in her apron, drying dishes methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the water overflowing from the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a puddle that's spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't reacted at all; it's heartbreaking how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the other side, the cabinet doors are wide open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy's stretched up on the stool, grabbing from the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back; this could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is reaching too, looking so eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're sharing the moment, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The yard outside is calm, unaware of the indoor drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for what might happen if they slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These everyday scenes can turn tragic so fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not be worth the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
